name: Idle Knights
description:
A free-standing RPG that anyone can enjoy easily.

- Easy operation without control!
- Automatic progress system that grows even when offline!
- 9 different job combinations and hundreds of skills through various party combinations!
- Explore, Dungeon, Pioneer, Drafts, and more!
- Skill board system that can transfer skill and grow to infinity!
- Cultivate your own powerful knights with reincarnation!
